content: "We can save on translations by giving it to an employee whose mother speaks that language." "And I suppose you save on the cost of a doctor by seeing someone whose mother had been a doctor?"
translations: ita:Possiamo risparmiare sulle traduzioni, dandole ad un impiegato la cui madre parli quella lingua. E suppongo che tu rispa
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Dejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
